Package net.sf.javaml.clustering.evaluation

Provides scores to evaluate the result of a clustering algorithm.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ClusterEvaluation This interface provides a frame for all measure that can be used to evaluate the quality of a clusterer.

Provides scores to evaluate the result of a clustering algorithm.
